General.Name: Samji Electronics Co. Ltd
General.Description: Samji Electronics Co., Ltd. provides communication and network equipment, system engineering energy solutions, and lottery terminals in South Korea. It offers optical readers, RF repeaters, in-building systems, and small cells, as well as communication and construction services; operation information display devices and gaming terminals; and battery packs, cyclers, and formation products. The company was formerly known as Samji Commerce co., Ltd and changed its name to Samji Electronics Co., Ltd. in January 1997. Samji Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Hwaseong-si, South Korea.
